name: Easy Sands of the Hourglass Trivia Quiz | Zelda Games | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these options is NOT a kind of Spirit Gem?
questions.explanation:
Hope.

	Wisdom Gems are blue and increase your defense rating, Power Gems are red and increase your attack rating, and Courage Gems are green and increase the range of your attack. You can only use one type of Gem at a time, and you must have collected at least ten of each Gem to unlock its ability. Once you collect all twenty of one kind of Gem, their ability power is increased even more!

questions.text: Who is the old seadog that provides Link with a ship?
questions.explanation:
Linebeck.

	Linebeck is a treasure-hungry pirate who first meets Link in the Temple of the Ocean King. He's somewhat of a coward and is ruthlessly pursued by the pirate Jolene. He is the captain of a paddle steamer boat, which Link uses to navigate between islands.

questions.text: Where does Link meet the Cubus sisters?
questions.explanation:
Aboard the Ghost Ship.

	The four Cubus sisters seem benign at first, but attack Link after they are reunited! Tetra had gone aboard the Ghost Ship to explore, but it led to her doom, and it is up to Link to find the fabled ship and rescue Tetra.

questions.text: Where does Link use the Phantom Hourglass?
questions.correct: The Temple of the Ocean King
questions.explanation:
The Temple of the Ocean King.

	The Temple of the Ocean King is a multi-floored structure that slowly drains the life of any adventurer who dares enter. Luckily, Link has the Phantom Hourglass, which gives him some time before his life is drained. As Link defeats enemies, more time is added to the hourglass.

questions.text: Once Link collects three pure metals, which tool is made?
questions.explanation:
The Phantom Sword.

	The Phantom Sword is an integral weapon in order to defeat Bellum. The three pure metals needed to forge the sword are Crimsonine, Azurine, and Aquanine. Zauz the Blacksmith makes the sword with these three metals.

questions.text: What is the biggest fish you can catch?
questions.explanation:
Neptoona.

	The Old Wayfarer gives Link a fishing rod, with which the player can play a fishing minigame! The biggest fish you can catch is the fabled Neptoona, and if you bring a Neptoona to the Wayfarer, he'll give you an extra heart container!

questions.text: Which character does Bellum possess in the final battle?
questions.explanation:
Linebeck.

	Link defeats Bellum once and everyone believes that the danger is over, but Bellum then reappears and takes control of Linebeck, making him twice as dangerous! Link again defeats Bellum and everyone, including Linebeck, is safe again.

questions.text: What is the true form of the Ocean King?
questions.explanation:
A white whale.

	The old man Oshus, who raised Ciela and mentors Link on his quest, reveals himself to be the Ocean King, who took the form of an old man in order to hide from Bellum. Once Bellum is defeated, the Ocean King takes his true form and is able to grant one wish to Linebeck.

questions.text: Who are the Anouki constantly at odds with?
questions.explanation:
The Yook.

	On the Isle of Frost, the two races are the Anouki and the Yook. One he lands there, Link has to settle a feud between the two races, begun when the head Anouki discovers that a Yook is impersonating one of his people. It turns out that Aroo is the fake Anouki.

	Gongoron is the son of Biggoron, head of the Gorons. Gongoron is playable in the final part of the Goron Temple and also in a Dee Ess Island minigame. Dee Ess Island is not initially viewable on the map, but appears once Link's ship draws near.
